long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We Become What We Behold is an intriguing and thought-provoking game available as a Chrome Extension. In this game, you take on the role of an observer, capturing and documenting the behaviors and interactions of people in a bustling city. As you photograph various events, you start to notice patterns and trends emerging. The game explores the concept that our actions and behaviors can have a profound impact on society and shape the world around us.

Through a series of captivating visuals and engaging gameplay, "We Become What We Behold" challenges you to make choices that influence the narrative and the direction of the city. Your goal is to capture significant moments that reflect the evolving nature of human behavior and its consequences. As you progress, you'll witness how your observations can shape the city's identity and the reactions of its inhabitants.

With its thought-provoking premise and minimalist art style, "We Become What We Behold" encourages players to contemplate the power of media, social influence, and the interconnectedness of our actions. It offers a unique and immersive gaming experience that prompts reflection on the world we live in.

You can enjoy playing "We Become What We Behold" for free on the website https://classroom-6x.org/. Immerse yourself in this captivating game and discover how your choices can shape the narrative and the society within the virtual city.
